'''Malachitin Lumibug''' is a type of creature that can be found in the wilds of [[Chenyu Vale]].

==Drops==
{{Card|Luminescent Spine|1}}

==Locations==
Malachitin Lumibugs can be found in the caves of Chenyu Vale.

See the '''[https://act.hoyolab.com/ys/app/interactive-map/index.html?lang=en-us#/map/2?shown_types=570 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.
